To use Bluetooth audio streaming:

1. Open the PC receiver application

2. Click on "Bluetooth" mode in the receiver

3. The PC will become discoverable as an audio device

4. On your phone, go to Settings â†’ Bluetooth

5. Pair with the PC receiver device

6. Play any audio on your phone - it will stream to PC!
Note: Bluetooth mode requires the PC receiver to be running in Bluetooth sink mode. This provides system-wide audio streaming without needing this app to capture audio.
Audio permission is required to stream system sound.
